name: Astral Wizard
description:
This Game Is For The Jame Gam #20
Theme:
Two Worlds
Special Feature:
The Cake
Description:
You are a powerful wizard who is able to tap into the cursed veggie dimension where all things bad live. When objects move around that indicates that there is evil near by. They can control and manipulate objects around you to inflict damage. You have to search through the astral plane to find the evil and then blast them with your magic.
Controls:
W,A,S,D - Move
Right Mouse Click - Search For Through The Astral World
Left Mouse Click - Magic Blast
